lead_paragraph: Cast aside by the demands of new harvesting technologies in the 1960s, a fondly remembered variety of tomato has been resurrected by Rutgers University.

headline.print_headline: A New Jersey Tomato, a Victim of Modern Farming, Makes a Comeback
headline.main: New Jersey Tomato, Victim of Modern Farming, Vies for a Comeback

snippet: Cast aside by the demands of new harvesting technologies in the 1960s, a fondly remembered variety of tomato has been resurrected by Rutgers University.
abstract: Rutgers University introduces reworked version of New Jersey tomato variety from 1934 that had unrivaled taste; seeds for Rutgers 250 tomato, named in honor of university's 250th anniversary, are selling briskly across country.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
